name: English
entity.evil_cube.description: A monolith of retired grandparents mindlessly pressing away at slots. When killed once, will become smaller and attempt to @ground pound@ instead of attack.
entity.robot.description: A digital copy of yourself, designed for maximum effeciency combat against intruders in all the same ways they; you; would attack.
entity.rat.description: A rat living within the casino's walls with a concerning amount of `children.`
menu.controllerWarning: Want to use a controller as the only player? Enable "No Keyboard" In the settings!
menu.itchWarning: Itch's default fullscreen button is broken. Use "O" to fullscreen at any time.
hint.weaponRequired: Get a weapon at the Wheel Of Fortune!
area.gamblezone.description:
`Return here to heal to full health, but will remove your combo!`
Gamble away all your earned @tokens@ for new @weapons@ and @attributes@!

|*The GambleZone is not responsible for potential health loss, newly created handicaps, enlargement, the breaking of kneecaps, etc.|
